title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Sales & Drama - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.30.19
description:
Right now, go to http://escapetheinvasion.com/kfgames for 20% off your first box.

Quip starts at just $25 and you’ll get your first refill FREE at http://getquip.com/games.

Gary Whitta and Greg talk about COD sales being crazy, PS4 becoming the second best selling home console, and all the Q2 news!

Time Stamps - 
00:04:15 - Housekeeping
Extra Life is Saturday 11/2! 24 hours of games for charity! Join us now at kindafunny.com/extralife or watch on the day!
But before that! Halloween Hellscape Thursday, on Halloween at 4PM. Youtube premiere on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:06:33 -  Call of Duty KILLS
00:15:55 - But there’s COD Controversy, JB @ GIB
00:22:40 - PlayStation 4 now the second best selling console ever, Q2 results
00:37:26 - Star Wars, Dragon Age and more from EA
00:42:16 Best Friend Q. - With the original dragon age 4 scrapped to focus on anthem and bioware losing a key producer in September can we hit the panic button? - Frankfurtter
00:48:38 -Ninja Theory’s Insight Project, Dom Matthews, Director at Ninja Theory
00:50:40 -  ESCAPE THE INVASION
00:52:18 - QUIP
00:53:39 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:58:00 - Now that EA Access and EA games have been brought to Steam, do you think Microsoft is eyeing the situation and trying to work out how they can get Game Pass on Steam as well? - Chad Betteridge
01:02:11 - THERE ARE TOO MANY GOOD GAMES OUT! And a lot coming down the pipe! How do you guys avoid the stress of getting to everything you want to play? - Jake Ulrey
01:03:52 - Squad Up: Steve(PS4) - SteveX418
01:04:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Imran
